title: Conservative blogger Jennifer Rubin confirms: ‘We will vote for ANY D’
text:
Now, it’s not surprising to hear either The Washington Post’s Jennifer Rubin or Max Boot declare that they’re going to vote straight Democrat until President Trump’s out of office and they’ve been trying to encourage their readers to do the same. But this might be the first time conservative blogger Rubin has announced in ALL CAPS that she and other Never Trumpers will be voting for any Democrat in 2020. Even Bill de Blasio if it came down to that? Yes, even Bill de Blasio.

Things begin here with Byron York sharing a piece about Never Trumpers plotting to back Joe Biden published in the Washington Examiner. David Drucker writes:

Biden, 76, is the most likely Democrat to receive measurable support from the Never Trump crowd, most of whom quickly concluded that the president does not face a realistic threat from the three Republicans challenging him in the GOP primary in 2020. “Biden is probably the only plausible candidate the Never Trumpers could support,” said Jim Dornan, a Republican operative in Washington who maintains relationships with anti-Trump Republicans. Ana Navarro-Cárdenas, a Florida GOP operative who backed Jeb Bush in 2016 and has been close to Sen. Marco Rubio, attended a Biden campaign event last weekend, sitting on the front row stroking her dog Chacha. Biden turned to her and said, “I’ve got to sort of genuflect in this direction here because I’m afraid of her. No. I’m embarrassing her, I know — that’s my intention. We’ve been good friends for a long time.”

Love how I don’t even get called for #nevertrump stories anymore. I’m too Trump-friendly it appears. LOL. Also, though, I like Biden but I’m not changing my party registration to vote for him. I’m a Republican. https://t.co/HfbQTi8oBl — Liz Mair (@LizMair) September 19, 2019

This is idiotic. They have the "conspiracy" all wrong. We will vote for ANY D. — Jennifer Rubin (@JRubinBlogger) September 19, 2019

They have the conspiracy to back Biden all wrong because Never Trumpers will vote for any Democrat who gets the nomination — that’s how you conserve conservatism.

There it is. The cold hard truth from the queen of the #NT crowd. https://t.co/tyFJGZAmKz — ⭐️ 𝕃𝕒𝕤𝕥 𝔾𝕣𝕖𝕒𝕥 𝔽ℝ𝔼𝔻𝕆 𝕠𝕗 𝔼𝕒𝕣𝕥𝕙! (@d4bzs) September 20, 2019

We already know you’re a Democrat. https://t.co/fXHLqnM6U9 — RBe (@RBPundit) September 20, 2019

Please quit saying you are a republican or conservative,you are a trump hater,period.

with no interest in protecting our country from the dem policies..that's sad and sick. — Kaye Bearden (@kkbear) September 19, 2019

So we can count on these conservatives to cast their vote for a full-on socialist promising free everything, or an imbecile like de Blasio, or Beto O’Rourke as his totalitarian promise to confiscate firearms and pull down the existing border fencing, or Pete Buttigieg, who believes human life hasn’t begun until a baby takes its first breath on its own, or …

God you are stupid. Sure, you’ll vote for any D bc your feelings are hurt. But you’d obviously prefer Biden to a radical reformer. — Alfred T. Cooper (@alfredtcooper) September 19, 2019

You’re all about the D aren’t you? — jim palmer (@spiv) September 19, 2019

Fortunately, Mair isn’t Rubin.

I won't. Though my vote is also irrelevant since CT will go blue by like 15 points probably. — Liz Mair (@LizMair) September 19, 2019

Related:
description: Maybe Eric Swalwell dropped out too early … Jennifer Rubin would have lined up to vote for him.
